name: lagbird.io
description:
lagbird.io

A suuuuuper simple multiplayer game (this kind of ".io" games)

  • Use the arrow keys to control your bird.
  • Use the mouse to aimd and to shoot the other players
  • Keep a safe distance from the fences and the ground
  • Invite someone if there is nobody in the session.

This game rely on mqtt instead of websockets to provide the multiplayer communication and was made in less than 72h. 

It is a submission for the Brackeys 2021.1 game jam. 

It lacks of testing and to be honest I dont know how many players can play in the same session without crashing. It was like a prototype and unfortunatelly I could not finish the way I want to.

I hope you enjoy a little!
